taskDescription: Expresses discomfort with ALFRED's casual tone during interactions
Requests a more formal communication style from ALFRED
Expresses concern about sharing her health data with others.
Wants to feel in control of her data sharing settings
Requests a simple setup that does not compromise her privacy
Seeks reassurance about how her data will be used
Wants to feel secure while using ALFRED
Asks Sarah to help navigate the app installation process
Expresses frustration about having to approve every installation on ALFRED
